#summary The border-left property sets the width, style, and color of the left border of a box.
#labels about-css,is-css-property,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSProperties Properties] > *border-left*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `[ <border-width> || <border-style> || 'border-left-color' ]`
  * `inherit`
